agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Environmental Regulation TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess Wednesday, February 13, 2019 PLACE: E2.028 CHAIR: Rep. J. M. Lozano The committee on Environmental Regulation will conduct an organizational meeting with invited testimony only. The agenda will be provided at the hearing. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
